channel.title: Run help!
channel.description:
When my friend tries to run my client it says cannot find java, but with me it's fine. this my run.bat
[code]@echo off title Run - Client start java -Xmx300m client 10 0 highmem members 32 exit[/code]
He just needs java for this to run right?
